room_title: Escape room "The Dorm" by Escape Matthews in Charlotte
review: My family had a blast over Thanksgiving weekend doing the Dorm room! We found the puzzles just challenging enough without being impossible, and we barely escaped in time! I recommend for any group!

room_title: Escape room "The Dorm" by Escape Matthews in Charlotte
review: My boyfriend surprised me with a trip to Escape Matthews for our first escape room experience. We are hooked! The staff are amazing and such dedicated people, and they make you feel like you're a welcomed guest. The dorm was fun and just challenging enough, we got out with 4.5 minutes to spare! We would definitely recommend it and we will be back!
